mapper.select: SELECT T.NO, E.NAME ORDERER, D.NAME DEPT_NO, T.TITLE, T.CONTENT, T.START_DATE, T.END_DATE, T.IMPORTANCE FROM TASK T JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON T.ORDERER = E.NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON T.DEPT_NO = D.NO
SELECT S.NO, E.NAME EMP_NO, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, S.ENORLL_DATE, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE, S.DEL FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON S.EMP_NO = E.NO WHERE DEL = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( NO, EMP_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCHEDULE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate} )
